item.title: Dog Chew Toys for Puppy Teething – 20 Pack Indestructible Pet Dog Toys for Puppy Chewers, Interactive Tug of War Rope Toys for Puppies, Small Dogs Durable Squeaky Toys for Boredom Chew Teething

item.content:encoded:
Price: $22.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:26:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

Dogs are known to be terrible chewers when they feel alone and grow teeth. Now, our family chew toys can protect your shoes, clothes, and even your furniture!

KILL ALL NEGATIVITY TO BUILD MORE POSITIVE ENERGY ALL DAY !

4 x Rubber Dog Chew Toy

Made of natural rubber, it is more flexible, durable and safe for your dog to chew and clean his teeth. Allow your dog to breathe better and have a healthier mouth. The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

10 x Rope Dog Toy

Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

Perfect Gift for Puppies

20 Pcs valued puppy chew toys great size for teething puppies. An Idea Choice for Your Puppies!

Product Dimensions ‚Äè : ‚Äé 9 x 7.8 x 3.93 inches; 2.4 Pounds
Date First Available ‚Äè : ‚Äé September 30, 2021
Manufacturer ‚Äè : ‚Äé qinhe
ASIN ‚Äè : ‚Äé B09HJR2GBB

„ÄêSmall Puppy Toys For Furniture Protection„Äë: Are you worried about your puppy chewing on the sofa, shoes, boredom, loneliness and releasing energy while teething? ‚ÄãOur toys are designed for puppy teething to help change your puppy’s bad chewing behavior, stop worrying, and keep your furniture safe. These puppy chew toys for teething not only clean the incisors, but also help clean the plaque hidden in dead spots, removing plaque and preventing cavities. Keep your puppy’s teeth healthy!
„ÄêInteractive Training Small Dog Toys„Äë: The snack ball is a great teething toy for dogs, and it can improve their IQ as they learn to toss and roll it for snacks. When dogs receive a healthy balance of physical and mental stimulation, they feel happy and well-adjusted. A variety of rope toys are perfect for tug-of-war, tossing and fetch games that promote relationships while interacting with your pet. Buy our puppy chew toys and make your dog smarter and happier!
„ÄêSafe And Tight Puppy Teething Chew Toys„Äë: The dog rope toy is made of 100% natural washable cotton, non-toxic and odorless, so your pet can chew and play safely. Our cotton rope dog toys are thin, but tough and durable. The wisdom balls and dog bones are also very chewy. If your dog is an aggressive chewer, then these puppy toys are not indestructible. They should only be played with under supervision. Dog toys bulk also keep the toys fresh in your dog’s mind
„ÄêQuality Gifts And Service„Äë: This puppy teething toy set is a great gift for friends who have puppies. It is also a great gift for your little family member. From fun indoor activities to outdoor play with your dog, just one set of puppy chew toys is enough to give your dog more fun and exercise in his daily life! If you have any questions about our products, please feel free to contact us, we are always ready to help you solve your problems!


Let’s protect your home and help dogs have more fun!

The cute design makes it easier for your dog to grasp. Puppy chew toy has small dimples that can really soothe your puppy’s gums. Brightly colored dog chew toys are easy to use and can satisfy your dog’s natural urge to chew.

  • Tightly hand-woven cotton rope toys for tug-of-war and catch games. With a large selection of rope toys, you can easily replace damaged toys and actually have a longer life span. Your pup will have fun playing with them while keeping them off your shoes or furniture.

1 IQ dog funnel ball and 2 loofah tooth cleaning dog toys

  • Made of hard plastic, these snack dispensing balls are durable and suitable for dogs to chew. The surface has a regular texture so it won’t roll too far and your dog can easily grab it. Also, your dog will love tossing and rolling the ball to remove treats when they hear the cute squeaking sound.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Price: $54.99 - $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:20:43 UTC – Details)


The Tile Starter Pack is an easy way to keep track of all the things you can’t live without. Mate is a versatile tracker that easily attaches to everyday must-haves likes keys, backpacks, wallets, and more. It has up to 250 ft Bluetooth range and a 3-year non-replaceable battery. Slim, Tile’s thinnest tracker, easily slides into your wallet, luggage tag, or a book. It has a 200 ft Bluetooth range and 3-year non-replaceable battery. Both Mate and Slim are water-resistant, work with Android and Apple¬Æ devices, have voice-assisted finding with Alexa, Google and Siri, and can be used to ring your phone if it ever gets lost.
TRACKER FOR KEYS, WALLETS AND MORE: Get started with our Mate and Slim to help you easily find what you can‚Äôt live without like your keys and wallet. Keep track of more for less with our multi-packs or give them to your friends and family as a gift.
FIND NEARBY — Use the Tile app to ring your Tile when it‚Äôs within Bluetooth range, or ask your Smart Home device to find it for you.
FIND FAR AWAY — When outside of Bluetooth range, use the Tile app to view your Tile‚Äôs most recent location on a map.
FIND YOUR PHONE- Double press the button on your Tile to make your phone ring, even when it‚Äôs on silent.
NOTIFY WHEN FOUND — Enlist the secure and anonymous help of the Tile Network to help find your things. If your lost Tile is found, If your Tile is lost, add your contact information so you can be reached when someone scans the QR code on your lost Tile.
ANDROID, IOS & SMART HOME COMPATIBLE – Find your things with the free Tile app on both iOS and Android devices. Tile also works with Amazon Alexa, Hey Google and Siri
TECH SPECS: Water-Resistant (IP67 rated), Up to 3-year non-replaceable battery, Up to 250 ft / 76 m Bluetooth range
UPGRADE TO A PREMIUM PLAN: Get proactive Smart Alert notifications when you leave something behind, and with Item Reimbursement, if we can‚Äôt find your Tiled item, we reimburse you.

Gentle For Your Furry Friend – These refreshing dog wipes are extra gentle and ideal for daily use around your pet’s eyes, ears, face, body and butt. Won’t remove spot flea treatments. Perfect for your puppy, kitten and even pet pig! Lightly scented, vanilla and coconut.
Use Less Wipes – The 7 x 11 inch wipes are larger than standard wipes, making them the smart choice for large pets and helps reduce how many wipes you need to use. Moistened with a gentle cleaning formula, and enriched with a soothing organic oat extract to keep your pet’s coat soft, shiny and smelling great.
Super Convenient, Goodbye Shampoo – Petkins are perfect for quick touch ups between baths. Use as dog paw wipes after a muddy walk, or when it’s too cold for a bath outside. A great solution for older pets that are difficult to bathe.
Easy To Use – Open the lid and remove seal. Pull a wet dog wipe out. Close lid tightly. Gently wipe entire pet until clean. No water or rinsing is required. Use daily or as needed.

Cleans your pet without shampoo Gentle pet wipes enriched with oatmeal. Easily remove daily dirt, alongside soothing dry, itchy skin The quick and convenient way to remove dirt, sand and mud from your pet‚Äôs paws after outdoor fun Dental wipes that remove daily residue to keep your pet’s teeth and gums clean and healthy Easy to use dental gel that cleans teeth, gums, plaque and tartar while freshening your pet‚Äôs breath

50 sets connectable: Easy to install with a cable tie or cup hook, fix it or place it anywhere necessary; up to 50 strands connectable to maximize your need for larger area lighting and festival decorations, 3.9 inches end cord with key designed female connector for quick access and easy connection
Replacement lights and fuse: 2 spare led bulbs and 2 spare fuses for replacement included, take off the led shade, pull out the damaged led bulb from bulb seat, plug in a new one with proper force and put back the shade; slide out the fuse chamber cover toward two blades and take out the burnt out one, install the new one correctly and close the cover; plug in and try working
Unexpected occasions: It is fabulous for Christmas, home, roof, garden, patio, balcony, porch, hallway, fence, shelf, bistro, pub, cafe, restaurant, shopping center, supermarket, New Year, birthday, gathering, disco ball party, dinner party, evening party, note:The AC plug is not waterproof, it should be protected from rainy day

Package includes 4 pieces of fine point black permanent markers, suitable for applying in a home, gardening, work, and other kinds of long-term marking work, which can meet your daily needs.
Mr. Pen garden marker is made of opaque ink that is chemically stable, lightfast, and quick-dry. Oil-based ink is odorless, non-toxic, acid-free, and environmentally friendly.
Durable fine round nib allows smooth and precise application. Our permanent pen markers that are short in size and have smooth and quick drying ink, can optimize your writing experience.
Mr. Pen garden markers are ideal for working on multiple surfaces; they can be applied to paintings, ceramics, wood, leather, plastic, fabric, canvas, stone, glass, metal, chalkboard, craft supplies, etc.
They are suitable for vegetable seedlings, greenhouses, gardening projects, pot experiments, etc. They will help you never lose track of what you planted.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:13:44 UTC – Details)



[More Efficient & Safer Light Sensors]-We use a more advanced monocrystalline solar panel and have upgraded its size. It can now receive, store and release solar energy more efficiently, dramatically increasing the solar energy conversion rate, meaning shorter charging times and longer lighting times. All modules are IP65 waterproof, whether it is raining, foggy or snowing can be used outdoors. Usually it can work up to 10-12 hours after 4-6 hours of charging in direct sunlight.
[Variable Lighting Modes to Create Various Ambiance]-The solar starlight light has 8 different lighting modes that can be adjusted by the ‘mode’ button behind the solar panel. And the built-in memory chip with memory function, every time you turn it on or when the night comes, it will automatically adopt the mode set for you last time. You can adjust to the most suitable lighting mode according to the need for decoration or different situations.
[Extra-Long & Widely Used Outdoor/Indoor String Lights]-The solar LED string lights are 66FT long, the spacing of LED beads is 10cm, and the lead length is 6FT, which can be easily installed in the place where decoration is needed. It can be molded into various shapes for gardens, courtyards, trees, porches, roofs, fences bistros, restaurants, hotels, commercial buildings. It can also be used in weddings, parties, Christmas, New Year parties to create a warm, joyful and festive ambiance.
[Be The Most Responsible Seller]-We are committed to provide you with high quality products. If you encounter any problem in the process of using solar string lights, please feel free to contact us, we will provide 7*24 hours technical service, you just need to send an email to the buyer center, we will reply within 8 hours.NOTE: It will automatically charge and light up at night when the switch behind the solar panel is turned on.

Not A Stand Alone Game – It requires a copy of Taco vs Burrito Core Deck that is Sold Separately
New Game Play – Takes the game play in Taco vs Burrito to the next level with 20 new game-changing cards including James Beardo, Super No Bueno, and a Wild Card.
Surprisingly Strategic – Basic gameplay is easy to master but the Action Cards shift the game into unpredictable territory. Exciting up to the very last card!
Created By A Kid, Perfect For Everyone – Alex dreamed up TvB at age 7, but this crazy, fun strategic food fight is a smash with kids, teens, and adults alike! Ideal for ages from 7+. This popular fun card game is the perfect Christmas or birthday gift for your boys, girls, friends, or family.
Easy To Learn and Quick To Play – Takes 3 minutes to learn,15 minutes to play and is for 2-8 players. Includes 20 cards, 4 tortilla holders, and instructions in a portable box that makes it great for traveling and playing outdoors


This wildly popular game was

Created by a 7 year old named Alex

Alex loves games and decided to create his own. For TACO VS. BURRITO, he spent months dreaming up ingredients, planning, and rethinking gameplay, and testing it thoroughly with people of all ages

When you buy TACO VS. BURRITO you are not only getting an amazing game that you‚Äôll love but you are also helping a young entrepreneur get his business off the ground. Thank you!

(as of Nov 30,2022 07:43:28 UTC – Details)


KT Tape is lightweight, comfortable to wear and can be used for many common injuries from neck and shoulder strains and pains all the way down to shin splints, Achilles tendonitis and nearly every injury that can affect muscles, joints and tendons in-between. KT Tape Classic is a cotton and elastic sports tape that relieves pain while supporting muscles, tendons and ligaments. When applied correctly, KT Tape reduces pressure to tissue which reduces discomfort and pain. That’s why KT Tape is used by and relied upon by professional athletes, athletic trainers and medical professionals. KT Tape is also used heavily in the Olympics by team USA. Sized at 2″ X 16′, This roll of KT Tape is designed to be cut into strips for customized care and a personalized fit. Making the classic Even more athlete friendly is that the acrylic based medical grade adhesive is gentle on skin, Unlike traditional athletic tape. This is one roll sized 2″ X 16′ Of Beige colored KT Tape Classic. In addition to pain relief, taping provides support to muscles by helping them to not over-extend or over-contract. KT Tape has more than 60 instructional videos available online teaching how to correctly apply the tape to support various body parts and to help with various injuries. The elastic core delivers strong support for muscles, joints and tendons without restricting comfort and range of motion. This means it will provide stronger support, for as long as you need it, remaining comfortable for up to 3 days. So durable, KT Tape will stay on in water be it the shower, The pool or the ocean. For best results, apply KT Tape One hour before activity and after you’ve first cleaned the skin of dirt and oils. Don’t overstretch the tape and make sure the ends are on skin, not on tape.
WHAT IS KT TAPE? ‚Äì Elastic sports tape used by pro and serious athletes to support muscles, joints, tendons, and ligaments. It‚Äôs drug-free, latex-free, hypoallergenic, lightweight, breathable, comfortable, HSA/FSA approved, and easy to use.
HOW DOES IT WORK? ‚Äì It helps reduce tissue pressure and support muscles and joints. Studies show it helps you recover faster from pain. Used for knee pain, shoulder pain, shin splints, back pain, plantar fasciitis, tennis elbow, and much more.
EASY TO USE ‚Äì Easy to self-apply using our free application videos (see our site) for common injury areas.¬† Our Taping Basics video teaches you how to help the tape stick properly, and our 60+ videos help you apply it for your area of pain.
TRUSTED BY PROFESSIONALS ‚Äì Relied on by professional and Olympic athletes, athletic trainers, and medical professionals to train longer and finish stronger. Used heavily by Team USA, NBA Trainers Association, US Soccer, USA Triathlon, and more.
KT Tape products are Hypoallergenic, Latex-Free, Natural Rubber-Free! This means that our products have been designed and developed to contain fewer potential substances that can trigger allergic reactions
